attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it is about time we held a Public vote of no confidence in this Prime Minister who was NOT elected by the British People. Who has the interests of his party (Labour) and himself at the top of his agenda not the Country. This PM has not followed his own manifesto & Has let the Country down for 10 years. Move aside Mr Brown

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
